name: RunAwayTrain
description:
Get more like this on Saturn91.dev

Hi Train driver

Get as far you can get and  try to beat the worldwide Highscore ;-)

Controlls

  • Engine Button: use your coal to fire the Engine
  • Whistle warn Obstacles about you're coming

Game:

  • don't get robbed (be fast enough to roll over the bandit)
  • don't hit the cows
  • be aware of the different slopes which can be used to speed up, but beware those which go up!
  • Dont let the indians steel your wagons (be quite!)
  • Warn woodjacks by whistling so they do not fell a tree on your tracks
